page.title: 10CHILDREN'S PLAYGROUND GAMES.
page.content:
We play in the school playground three times during the school day: 20 minutes at mid-morning, 20 minutes after lunch, and 20 minutes in mid-afternoon.
One of the games we play is called Spud. Somebody throws a ball and calls a name. The person named must catch the ball while the others run away. THe catcher is allowed four steps, then he must throw the ball: whoever the ball hits is 'on it' next.
Another game we play is called British Bulldog. It is a rough game which starts with one person in the middle of the yard and all the others at one side. As they run from side to side, those who are caught by the middle boy have to help him catch the others.
